title: Financial Statement Analysis
ziele: Students will understand the basic concepts of financial statement analysis and will be able to interpret and analyze financial statements according to the Austrian Unternehmensgesetzbuch (UGB).
lehrinhalte: Financial statement analysis focusing on techniques such as financial ratios which help assess a company's profitability and liquidity.
voraussetzungen: (*)KS Bilanzierung
methoden: Theoretical input, analyzing financial statements, class discussion
literatur: Lecture notes; further reading will be announced in class.
